channel.title: Git on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: How we switched from Subversion to Git
item.description: So I heard about these strange distributed version control systems like over a year ago. I used it in my own little projects and everything went smoothly and I really liked it. The idea also caught on at work and my team started a using Git in a fresh project last summer. We did not had so much problems since you can use Git very much like a central vcs like Subversion if you want to.
